channel.title: RUNNING a 508 source

item.title: RUNNING a 508 source
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Change your run.bat to:

@echo off cd ../bin java -cp . palidino76/rs2/Server 43594 pause

Read full topic

item.title: RUNNING a 508 source
item.dc:creator: @teh_war_of_noobs teh war of noobs
item.description:
@teh_war_of_noobs wrote:

right click on the run.bat and find something that looks like this
jdk1.0.6_12/… just change that to your Java version and try to run it again, hope this helped

Read full topic

item.title: RUNNING a 508 source
item.dc:creator: @how_to_do_it how to do it
item.description:
@how_to_do_it wrote:

i try running my 508 server source but when i click on run.bat
iy closes the ‘black box’ immediately
this is what’s in the run.bat::

@echo off
cd …/bin
java -cp . palidino76/rs2/Server 43594

^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
please gime a new run.bat or tell em how to fix

Read full topic
